name: Unveiling
description:
You drive a car when a UFO crosses the road. You get abducted, but what comes next is not what you expect.



It's an enigmatic trip of your mind towards the mind of the Other. It has something to say to you. Will you listen? Will you understand?



The gameplay of "Unveiling" is simple and the puzzles are unobtrusive. You move through mind-bending environments, wrapped in striking visuals, and interact with pieces of the story.



This 30-minute experience is inspired by the love of sci-fi and the resurgence of UFO/UAP in the modern psyche. It explores a moment of contact and the possible motives of Non-Human Intelligence.
